p: All tests were carried out in triplicate, and the results were presented as means Â± SD. Statistical analysis was performed using Microsoft Excel 2010 (Microsoft Corp., Redmond, WA, USA, 2010) and GraphPAD Prism software (San Diego, CA, USA, 2007). A Wilcoxon test was performed to compare the data. Statistical significance was defined as p < 0.05.
